organisation_name: Werkgroep voor een Rechtvaardige en Verantwoorde Landbouw (Wervel vzw)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: contribution to newsletters for european and belgian audience mainly.
goals__remit: Wervel is a volunteer movement for healthy agriculture, aiming to 1/disseminate expertise with a holistic perspective on agriculture to press, academia, organisations (in order to do that, studies decisions with regard to agriculture on all policy levels);  2/ show how agroecology works (for instance agroforestry) through spotting pioneer innovations, networking and liaising with researchers and farmers 3/ empower communities around schools (parents, teachers, local catering companies, farmers) to work together to reclaim 'schoolmeals as commons' as they transform them into local, eco and fair.
